patthana16.36:1.1_0: Parittaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.36:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe ekādasa …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.36:2.1_0: Parittaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.36:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cuddasa, ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate cuddasa.
